Arizer

Vaporizer Portable Arizer Solo II

CAS02B

Log in for pricing

The Arizer Solo II is the latest vaporizer produced by the well known and respected Canadian manufacturer Arizer. This device is the evolved version of the famous Arizer Solo that we all know and loved. Although there are many similarities to the original Solo, this version has really stepped it up a notch where it counts; such as the LED display, temperature control capabilities, an improved air path system and better battery life.

One of the most significant changes on the new Solo II in the user-friendly interface. The original Solo featured seven temperature indication lights which has been replaced by an LED display on the newer model. Below this new display are the navigation buttons which allows easy control of the customization features and temperature control.

The Solo II allows precise customization through various settings. These settings include volume control, a session timer, temperature measurement options (Celsius or Fahrenheit), LED brightness and a start-up timer. Using these new features is a guaranteed way to improve your vaping experience.

The Solo II provides extreme temperature flexibility which can be set anywhere between 50 and 210 degrees Celsius. The heat up time is also much quicker and more efficient than the previous model. The new Solo II takes less than 30 seconds to reach the maximum temperature, a significant improvement.

Time to brag about vapour quality, a right which the Arizer Solo II has earned. The air path has been improved to make it less restrictive which improves airflow. Also, with the new precision temperature control system, the flavour produced is much more pure and tasteful. Use the lower temperatures to preserve flavour and to create a thinner cloud or increase the temperature for a thicker cloud which reduces some of the flavour but produces no harshness.

The Solo II has twice the battery lifespan of its predecessor and four times more than the original Arizer Air. Depending on your heat setting, the Solo II will provide up to three hours of impressive battery life.

How to Use:

  1. Load Glass Aroma Tube. Do not over pack dish or pack dish too tightly.
  2. Insert the glass aroma tube.
  3. Press and hold the up arrow (^) and the menu (M) button to power the unit on.
  4. Use the arrow buttons to set the desired temperature.
  5. Inhale vapour through the glass aroma tube.

Pro Tip for aroma therapy purposes, use the small dish for dried botanicals (example: lavender flowers) and/or 4-8 drops of essential oils. Set the temperature between 50 ºC - 100 ºC (122 ºF - 212 ºF) and gently inhale the fragrance.

Product Includes:

1 x Solo II Multi-Purpose Micro Heater
1 x Charger / Power Adapter
1 x Glass Aroma Tube (90 mm)
1 x Glass Aroma Tube (110 mm)
1 x Glass Aroma Dish
1 x Belt-Clip Carrying Case
2 x Silicone Stem Cap
1 x Stainless Steel Stirring Tool
4 x Stainless Steel Filter Screens
1 x Sample Aromatic Botanicals
1 x Owner's Manual

Warranty The Solo II include a manufacturer lifetime warranty on the heating element, a limited two-year warranty covering defective material or workmanship and a one-year warranty on the battery. Please retain proof of purchase for warranty. Warranty does not cover misuse, mistreatment, damaged caused by dropping or tampering of the product.

Exxus Mini With FREE Puff Puff Pass Electric Grinder Pen

CE2056BK

Log in for pricing

LIMITED TIME PROMO

Buy Exxus Mini get a Puff Puff Pass Electric Grinder Pen for FREE!

--

Exxus Mini has the distinction of being the smallest vape of its type. This vaporizer is merely an inch in width and four inches in height, is very easy to carry around. It has a variety of features that should wow people who are looking for quality vaporizers. Its warm-up time is just 30 seconds. The vaporizer has a convenient mouthpiece air path system that offers heat reduction benefits as well. Its highest possible temperature is 410 degrees. The Exxus Mini features an anodized heating chamber. Its body is made of aluminum gunmetal that contributes to its fashionable, cool and modern look. 

 

How to Use:

  1. Remove the mouthpiece and loosely pack your favorite legal herb into the chamber.
  2. Clip the mouthpiece back on then rapidly click the power button five times to turn device.
  3. Use the arrow buttons to set device to desired temperature. Device will take a maximum of 30 seconds to heat up.
  4. Inhale vapor and enjoy!

 Pro Tip – Purchase the Exxus Hydro Adapter to boost performance by 75%.

Atman

510 Battery 2.0-4.0V Adjustable Voltage

CV5015B

Log in for pricing

These 510 threaded batteries are compatible with pre-filled or refillable cartridges. Featuring four stylish colours and variable voltage, this battery is perfect for puffing.

This Atman 380mAh battery, allows you to enjoy vaping all day before recharging. Adjust the voltage between 2.0 and 4.0V depending on the type of material you’re using in your cartridge. The 510 thread size is the most common, so it will fit with the majority of available carts. The USB provides a fast charge without requiring a wall block. For safety purposes and to prevent overheating the battery stops outputting power if the draw taken is too lengthy.

To turn the device on, quickly press the button 5 times. Hold that same button down to draw. It’s personal preference whether you prefer to hold the button and heat up the material to get a massive hit, or start drawing as soon as you press the button down for a more moderate hit.

Preheat mode can be activated by rapidly clicking the button 2 times, this allows for the battery to continuously heat for 15 seconds. The device also has an auto-shutoff to prevent overheating.

Variable voltage is achieved by simply twisting the bottom of the battery to desired temperature. The voltage range is between 2.0 and 4.0 volts. Remember, different viscosity’s will vaporize better at different temperatures.

To charge the battery, screw on the charger the same way you would thread the cartridge. It is recommended to charge in a computer or a similar device. Sometimes using a wall adapter (especially a high powered one) can cause damage to the battery. The lights on the device and charger will be red while charging, and then turn off on the pen and change to green on the charger when complete.

This functional and stylish battery is available in Red, Silver, Blue and Black.

Focus V

Focus V Carta E-Rig

HTI120

Log in for pricing

 

The Focus V Carta is a battery-powered, portable, desktop rig. This unique device allows you to use dry herb or concentrates with the option of adding water. The unit includes quartz and titanium buckets for optimal vaporization.

Charge your Carta before initial use with the included USB-C charging cable. Next step is adding both 18350 batteries into the bottom of the unit. After that, fill glass top with water, ensuring it’s not overfilled and that the attachment holes line up with base. Unit can be used without water. To change buckets, twist off metal attachment on front of unit, then carefully twist the top black piece in the same direction as the arrows, insert chosen bucket and reassemble.

How to Operate
ON/OFF: 5 clicks
CHANGE TEMP: 1 click
SET TEMP: 1 click
Device will vibrate when temperature is reached.

LED Settings
START-UP: Blinking white
HEATING UP: Blinking blue
READY TO USE: Solid green
LOW BATTERY: Blinking red

Battery Life/Charging
1 Solid Red LED: 25%
2 Solid Red LED’s: 50%
3 Solid Red LED’s: 75%
ALL LED’s: 100%

Temp Settings
Level 1 = 500⁰F/260⁰C
Level 2 = 630⁰F/332⁰C
Level 3 = 770⁰F/410⁰C
Level 4 = 842⁰F/450⁰C
*App is available to customize temperature settings

Focus V Carta has a warranty of 3 years on defective materials used for device and 1 month on atomizers from retail purchase date.

The Yocan UNI Pro is a universally compatible Digital Box Mod that works with all oil atomizers of all lengths and sizes. It brings vape customization and personalization to the next level.

This Patented Digital Box Mod features a chamber with adjustable width and height to ensure that all oil atomizers will fit snugly regardless of size or shape. In addition to its patented adjustable design, it also features a 10-second preheat function, a volt range of 2.0V–4.2V, and a hanging hole for easy attachment to a strap or lanyard. The bright OLED display clearly indicates voltage and remaining change, and the simple button interface allows for easy operation.

The Yocan UNI Pro Digital Box Mod celebrated for its minimalist design, amazing portability, and straightforward operation. It’s perfect for travelling and can be enjoyed by vape users at every experience level. Available in a wide variety of colors, there’s a UNI Pro for every occasion and it will still make an excellent addition to your collection. With unmatched customization and impressive performance, You’ll be vaping like a pro in no time with the UNI Pro Digital Box Mod from Yocan.

Yocan

Yocan STIX

CE3148B

Log in for pricing

YoCan is a leading manufacturer in healthy vaporizers. They stand behind the quality and innovative craftsmanship of their products and are CE, RoHS and FCC certified.

The Yocan STIX is a small, discreet, leak-proof juice pen. Easy to use, and super portable this pen is designed for vaping on the go. The ceramic coil offers a clean, smooth draw. To use the device, unscrew the base connector from the battery and then disconnect the mouthpiece from the base connector. Add your oil into the mouthpiece carefully, ensuring not to get any in the center tube. Save your base connector for extra filled pods. Turn the device upside down and screw the mouthpiece back on. To turn on the unit, click the button 5 times in under 2 seconds, and press the same button 3 times to change temperature. The sleek design utilizes a 350 mAh battery.

Yocan

Yocan Evolve Plus

CE3067BK

Log in for pricing

The Yocan Evolve Plus is a sleek, powerful yet durable little device. The 1100 mah battery allows for 15 seconds of continuous heat and because of the built-in silicone jar, the Yocan Evolve is the first multifunctional travel vape in the dab market. It is easy to charge with a micro USB and can be wall charged or plugged into your laptop for charging on the go.

Special Features:

  • Atomizer Tube
  • Coil Cap
  • Quartz Dual Coil (QDC)
  • Base
  • Battery
  • Silicone Jar

Product Specifications:

  • Material: Pure metal with quartz coils
  • Use: Concentrates only
  • Thread: Standard 510 Tread
  • Battery: Built-in 1100 mAh
  • Weight: 210g

Directions:

  1. Make sure you give your device a full charge for best initial use
  2. Remove mouthpiece and remove coil cap
  3. Put product into the coil remember not to over fill as it will cause leakage from the coil onto the battery replace coil cap and mouthpiece
  4. Turn the device on by clicking the fire button 5 times consecutively in 3 seconds
  5. For best results, please finish all your product in the bowl to prevent leaking through the coil to the top of the battery
  6. Turn off device using same method used to power it on

Product Includes:

  • 1 x Evolve Plus Atomizer
  • 1 x Evolve Plus Battery (1100 mah)
  • 1 x Replacement Dual Quartz Coil
  • 1 x Small Tool
  • 1 x Micro USB cable

Pro Tip Use a cotton swab and isopropyl alcohol to keep the top of the battery, bottom of the coil and the treads around the mouthpiece clean. The coil, cap and silicone base can be soaked in isopropyl alcohol and left to dry

Warranty Information: 6 month limited warranty.

Boundless Technology

Boundless Terp Pen

CV1051S

Log in for pricing
The Terp Pen by Boundless is an open coil based dab system, this makes it ideal for using as a nectar collector. The Terp Pen utilizes 2 ceramic coils, ensuring clean, flavourful hits. The device is inhale activated, so it starts working as soon as you draw. There is a 10 second timer to prevent overheating, so if you’d like a larger hit make sure to pause during your hit. With this device you can vape out of a jar or off of your dab tool for a true nectar collector experience. You can also preheat your unit by drawing, melt a little bit of extract roughly the size of a rice grain onto the coils and draw again – this is ideal for those monitoring their doses. This pen-sized device is perfect for beginners or experts and is available in black and silver.
Shatterizer

Shatterizer Vaporizer

SHA10G

Log in for pricing

Shatterizer was founded in Canada by experienced consumers who wanted to make a product for new and seasoned vapors alike. They are committed to customer satisfaction, shattering expectations and of course #perfectclouds.

The Shatterizer is a concentrate vaporizer that offers a unique design and smooth hit. It’s uncomplicated to use and clean. When used properly with a full charge it can produce up to 70 hits. The aluminum bubble-like top allows the vapor to cool and leaves you with a satisfyingly smooth draw.

To turn the unit on and off simply click the button 5 times within two seconds. The same button is used to change temperature by quickly pressing it 3 times. To fill chamber, remove top piece carefully, unscrew cap and gently add concentrate, ensuring not to damage coils. While charging device, light is red and will turn off when fully charged. After 15 seconds of continuous draw, device will cut off heat and flash 8 times.

Wulf

Vaporizer Wulf Mod Tundra

CWT001BK

Log in for pricing

The Wulf Tundra Classic Vape is portable and user friendly. It has 3 Preset temperature settings and a stainless steel encased ceramic chamber which allows your device to heat up quickly and evenly distribute heat throughout your herb. You can easily enjoy up to a 60 minute session on a single charge with the lithium-ion battery. This device is compact, easily controlled with 1 hand and has minimal cleanup after use.

Special Features:

Directions:

  1. First, remove the mouthpiece from your device by applying pressure from side to side (removing front to back could cause damage to the mouthpiece)
  2. Before filling the chamber of your device, allow it to preheat without the mouthpiece
  3. Turn on your device by pressing the power button rapidly 5x
  4. To set your desired temp, hold the power button for 3 seconds to change the temperature
  • 360 Fº is ideal for light vapour
  • 420 Fº is ideal for dense vapour
  1. Grind herb and fill the chamber with the desired amount (for best results grind herb to crushed pepper consistency)
  2. Do not overpack the chamber or else the device will not have good airflow
  3. Once you have vaped your product, give it a stir. If your herb is all discoloured it is no longer useable. If it still has some colour, stir it up and keep on vaping

Arizer

Arizer V-Tower Desktop

CV1100

Log in for pricing

V-Tower

Hailing from Canada, Arizer set out to make a vaporizer comparable to other well-known units for a fraction of the price. Utilizing true convection, the V-Tower is a convenient and reliable desktop vaporizer. The V-Tower uses glass components perfect for maintaining flavour and keeping clean. The digital readout allows for temperature, volume and C/F control, while the wide base keeps the device sturdy. The exterior of the unit is high grade, dual-wall, stainless steel that stays cool to the touch. However, the glass pieces get hot. Seriously.

Instructions

To use: Press power button to turn ON/OFF. Unit will beep and digital readout will appear. Toggle through precise temperatures by pressing the up and down arrows. Hit the menu button to silence unit to switch between Celsius and Fahrenheit, or set timer. Unit takes about a minute to heat up fully. Remember the element is wrapped in glass, so it will get HOT. It is recommended for first time use to let unit burn off excess materials for roughly 5 minutes before using. Optimal temperature is based on moisture content of your herb, amount being used, whether it’s fine or coarsely ground, how discreet you’re trying to be and of course the type of hit you enjoy. Somewhere between 180-220⁰C is a great place to stay within, remember it’s always easier to add heat than to remove it. While you’re waiting for your unit to heat start packing your bowl, and once heating is completed connect bowl with glass surrounding heating element. After bowl is placed on device ONLY touch the black rim (this black rim should be at the top) – the rest of the glass will be TOO HOT. I cannot stress this enough, you WILL burn your fingers. After the bowl is in place add glass whip. Draw slowly to achieve proper hits. Adding heat as your session increases is a great way to utilize all your herb has to offer. When herb is finished it will lose it’s flavour and will be a dark brown colour, however it will still be the same consistency as when you put it in. Save your vaporized material for making edibles. Vaporizing has “decarboxylated” the herb for you – you’re ready to bake!
